## GridProGenesisDatasource.deinit() method

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> Use `destroy` instead
> 

Deinitialises the datasource, resetting it to its initial state.

**Signature:**

```typescript
deinit(): void;
```
**Returns:**

void
